dc:title: b>"Traveling by Bus"</b
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Gives reasons why bus travel is so ideal, safe, scenic and social. Describes her experiences with the people she meets on the buses, and ends with a traveling anecdote about P. Maurin.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 19 1950-03-10 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
